Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmmoSquare, SpawnAndShopSquare
    public abstract class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a generic Square, it must be specialized in either a SpawnAndShopSquare or a AmmoSquare

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        protected Square​(java.lang.String name,
                 int y,
                 int x,
                 SquareBorder[] borders)
        This constructor is used as a common constructor for both Square's subclasses
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the square
        y - The first coordinate
        x - The second coordinate
        borders - The 4 SquareBorder, one for each cardinal direction

      • Square

        protected Square​(Square square,
                 GameBoard clonedGameBoard)
        This constructor is a copy constructor, it create a new Square that is the copy of a given one
        Parameters:
        square - The Square that has to be copied
        clonedGameBoard - The already cloned GameBoard

      • grab

        public abstract java.util.List<Branch> grab​(Player player,
                                            java.util.List<PowerUpCard> powerUpCards)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player in which addTarget the resources
        powerUpCards - The list of discarded PowerUpCard for reducing the WeaponCards cost
        Returns:
        A single Branch from which the Player can choose what to grab
